meanings.definition: To focus too much on something.
meanings.sent1: She tends to overfocus on small details and misses the big picture.
meanings.sent2: Sometimes, it is easy to overfocus on one task and forget about everything else.
meanings.sent3: He overfocuses on his favorite TV show so much that he forgets to eat dinner.
meanings.sent4: Her mind overfocuses on the upcoming exam, making it hard to relax.
meanings.sent5: The detective's overfocus on a single suspect led to overlooking other important clues.

meanings.definition: The act of focusing too much on something.
meanings.sent1: His overfocus on work caused him to neglect his personal life.
meanings.sent2: An overfocus on perfection can sometimes hinder progress.
meanings.sent3: The team's overfocus on winning the game made them forget to have fun.
meanings.sent4: The overfocus on the issue overshadowed other important matters.
meanings.sent5: The student's overfocus on grades prevented them from enjoying the learning process.
